title: Swain can Ult in Zhonya???
body:
So i was playing this game the other day and i noticed that the enemy Swain's ult was still active while Zhonya-ed. This doesn't make sense. Not to mention it's broken. His crows kept flying back and forth and he was regenerating health (or lifesteal, i don't really know how it works) all while being in Zhonya mode. 
I'm just wondering if this was just a glitch or something yet to be patched.

replies.body: Morgana can do the same thing with her ultimate, it's not a bug.

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7d4svW9v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-04T05:16:30.156+0000)
>
> Morgana can do the same thing with her ultimate, it's not a bug.

I thought they patched that, same with Kat???
Idk what you're going on about with kat but they never patched anything to do with that, zhonyas doesn't stop channeled abilities and toggles like swain and anivias ult.
it stops channel abilities, but it doesnt stop toggle (which is what anivia and swains is)

and fiddle, once a channel is ACTIVE, zhonyas can't interupt it

Aniv Ult still runs while zhonyas too

its a constant effect, not a channel, channels require a constant unbroken duration, which is why kats does cancel as opposed to swain and anivia, which are toggles, a constant effect. If you zhonya during the channel on fiddles ult it will cancel, but it wont cancel after the channel as it is now a prolonged effect
the only reason i take zhonyas playing swain.
